txt.en: 'You have never listened, Sisters!'
'Let he who bears the guilt be the one to end you all!'
'These waters shall be pure once more!'
'The currents shall take you!'
Instance: Rage of the Erui
'Such is the frailty of Men!'
'Look upon the death that surrounds you!'
'Leave me alone!'
'Begone, all of you!'
'My Sisters... I... cannot...'
'We have all known horrors...'
'None can escape the waters of the Erui!'
'...and the evils of Men.'
'As all our rivers converge, let us also reunite as one...'
'...and stand together against the evil in the East!'
Sister, no! This is not the way!'
'I cannot bear... to hold such anger within me any longer.'
'We can still help you... listen to us!'
'I shall not wield my waters against the innocent... for my wounds are old, far older than any that yet live.'
'Thank you, my Sisters. Let me do naught but good for the peoples of Middle-earth in the days to come...'
'No more blood shall be spilled in my waters!'
'Drown, [placeholder], and trouble me no more!'
'Sister! What has become of you?'
'Behold, Sister, the legacy of Men!'
'Is such wickedness what you truly seek?'
'I did not seek it! It was forced upon me!'
'Stand strong, [placeholder], for my Sister's madness must be ended!'
'Do you hear me, Sister? Put an end to this, or we shall wash you away!'
'Be free of your fears and let our strength flow through you!'
'Sister... you are still one of us.'
'You cannot overpower us all, Sister. This [placeholder] will not fall!'
